title: Employee Performance Review Form
description: Annual performance evaluation to assess employee achievements, skills, and areas for development

review_intro.title: Performance Review Process
review_intro.description: This performance review is designed to evaluate employee performance, recognize achievements, identify areas for improvement, and establish development goals. The review process encourages open communication between employees and managers to support professional growth and organizational success.

review_instructions.title: Instructions
review_instructions.description:
• Both manager and employee should prepare for the review by reflecting on the past performance period
• Complete each section with specific examples and observations
• Be objective and focus on behaviors and results rather than personality
• Provide constructive feedback that helps the employee grow professionally
• Discuss the completed review in a private meeting
• Both parties should sign the form after the review discussion
• The completed form will be stored in the employee's personnel file

review_date.title: Review Date
review_date.description: Date of the performance review meeting

employee_name.description: Full name of the employee being reviewed

goals_summary.description: Review the goals and objectives established for this performance period. Assess the employee's progress and achievement of each goal.

goal3_comments.title: Goal 3 Comments
goal3_comments.description: Comments on progress, achievements, and challenges related to Goal 3

competencies_intro.title: Core Competencies Assessment
competencies_intro.description:
Evaluate the employee's demonstration of core competencies that are essential for all employees in the organization. Rate each competency on a scale of 1-5:

1 = Needs significant improvement
2 = Needs some improvement
3 = Meets expectations
4 = Exceeds expectations
5 = Exceptional performance

job_skills_intro.title: Job-Specific Skills Assessment
job_skills_intro.description:

1 = Needs significant improvement
2 = Needs some improvement
3 = Meets expectations
4 = Exceeds expectations
5 = Exceptional performance
